verses.verse: ( Drive Out the Nations) כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî When יְבִֽיאֲךָ֙ <WH935> yə·ḇî·’ă·ḵā brings יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- you into הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- that אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> ’at·tāh you בָא־ <WH935> ḇā- are entering שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> šām·māh ... לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <WH3423> lə·riš·tāh to possess, וְנָשַׁ֣ל <WH5394> wə·nā·šal and He drives out גּֽוֹיִם־ <WH1471> gō·w·yim- nations — רַבִּ֣ים׀ <WH7227> rab·bîm many מִפָּנֶ֡יךָ <WH6440> mip·pā·ne·ḵā before you הַֽחִתִּי֩ <WH2850> ha·ḥit·tî the Hittites, וְהַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֨י <WH1622> wə·hag·gir·gā·šî Girgashites, וְהָאֱמֹרִ֜י <WH567> wə·hā·’ĕ·mō·rî Amorites, וְהַכְּנַעֲנִ֣י <WH3669> wə·hak·kə·na·‘ă·nî Canaanites, וְהַפְּרִזִּ֗י <WH6522> wə·hap·pə·riz·zî Perizzites, וְהַֽחִוִּי֙ <WH2340> wə·ha·ḥiw·wî Hivites, וְהַיְבוּסִ֔י <WH2983> wə·hay·ḇū·sî and Jebusites, שִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> šiḇ·‘āh seven גוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> ḡō·w·yim nations רַבִּ֥ים <WH7227> rab·bîm larger וַעֲצוּמִ֖ים <WH6099> wa·‘ă·ṣū·mîm and stronger מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> mim·me·kā than you —

וּנְתָנָ֞ם <WH5414> ū·nə·ṯā·nām has delivered them over יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah·weh and when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·ne·ḵā to you וְהִכִּיתָ֑ם <WH5221> wə·hik·kî·ṯām to defeat them, הַחֲרֵ֤ם <WH2763> ha·ḥă·rêm then you must devote them to complete destruction תַּחֲרִים֙ <WH2763> ta·ḥă·rîm ... אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> ’ō·ṯām -. ( Forms of the Hebrew cherem refer to the giving over of things or persons to the LORD, either by destroying them or by giving them as an offering; also twice in verse 26.) לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- no תִכְרֹ֥ת <WH3772> ṯiḵ·rōṯ Make לָהֶ֛ם Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) with them בְּרִ֖ית 1285 N-fs ( bə·rîṯ) treaty וְלֹ֥א 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō) and show them no תְחָנֵּֽם׃ 2603 V-Qal-Imperf-2ms│3mp ( ṯə·ḥān·nêm) mercy.

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> wə·lō Do not תִתְחַתֵּ֖ן <WH2859> ṯiṯ·ḥat·tên intermarry בָּ֑ם Prep│3mp ( bām) with them. בִּתְּךָ֙ 1323 N-fsc│2ms ( bit·tə·ḵā) your daughters לֹא־ 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō-) Do not תִתֵּ֣ן 5414 V-Qal-Imperf-2ms ( ṯit·tên) give לִבְנ֔וֹ 1121 Prep-l│N-msc│3ms ( liḇ·nōw) to their sons וּבִתּ֖וֹ 1323 Conj-w│N-fsc│3ms ( ū·ḇit·tōw) their daughters לֹא־ 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō-) or תִקַּ֥ח 3947 V-Qal-Imperf-2ms ( ṯiq·qaḥ) take לִבְנֶֽךָ׃ 1121 Prep-l│N-msc│2ms ( liḇ·ne·ḵā) for your sons,

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- because יָסִ֤יר <WH5493> yā·sîr away אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בִּנְךָ֙ <WH1121> bin·ḵā they will turn your sons מֵֽאַחֲרַ֔י <WH310> mê·’a·ḥă·ray from following Me וְעָבְד֖וּ <WH5647> wə·‘ā·ḇə·ḏū to serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm gods. אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> ’ă·ḥê·rîm other וְחָרָ֤ה <WH2734> wə·ḥā·rāh will burn אַף־ <WH639> ’ap̄- Then the anger יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD בָּכֶ֔ם Prep│2mp ( bā·ḵem) against you, וְהִשְׁמִידְךָ֖ 8045 Conj-w│V-Hifil-ConjPerf-3ms│2ms ( wə·hiš·mî·ḏə·ḵā) destroy you. מַהֵֽר׃ 4118 Adv ( ma·hêr) and He will swiftly

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- Instead אִם־ <WH518> ’im- ..., כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> kōh this is what תַעֲשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> ṯa·‘ă·śū you are to do to them: לָהֶ֔ם Prep-l│Pro-3mp ( lā·hem) ... מִזְבְּחֹתֵיהֶ֣ם 4196 N-mpc│3mp ( miz·bə·ḥō·ṯê·hem) their altars, תִּתֹּ֔צוּ 5422 V-Qal-Imperf-2mp ( tit·tō·ṣū) tear down וּמַצֵּבֹתָ֖ם 4676 Conj-w│N-fpc│3mp ( ū·maṣ·ṣê·ḇō·ṯām) their sacred pillars, תְּשַׁבֵּ֑רוּ 7665 V-Piel-Imperf-2mp ( tə·šab·bê·rū) smash וַאֲשֵֽׁירֵהֶם֙ 842 Conj-w│N-fpc│3mp ( wa·’ă·šê·rê·hem) their Asherah poles, תְּגַדֵּע֔וּן 1438 V-Piel-Imperf-2mp│Pn ( tə·ḡad·dê·‘ūn) cut down וּפְסִילֵיהֶ֖ם 6456 Conj-w│N-mpc│3mp ( ū·p̄ə·sî·lê·hem) their idols תִּשְׂרְפ֥וּן 8313 V-Qal-Imperf-2mp│Pn ( tiś·rə·p̄ūn) and burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ 784 Prep-b, Art│N-cs ( bā·’êš) in the fire.

כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî For עַ֤ם <WH5971> ‘am are a people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <WH6918> qā·ḏō·wōš holy אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> ’at·tāh you לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God בְּךָ֞ Prep│2ms ( bə·ḵā) . בָּחַ֣ר׀ 977 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( bā·ḥar) has chosen you יְהוָ֣ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) The LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ 430 N-mpc│2ms ( ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā) your God לִהְי֥וֹת 1961 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( lih·yō·wṯ) to be לוֹ֙ Prep│3ms ( lōw) for His לְעַ֣ם 5971 Prep-l│N-msc ( lə·‘am) a people סְגֻלָּ֔ה 5459 N-fs ( sə·ḡul·lāh) prized possession מִכֹּל֙ 3605 Prep-m│N-msc ( mik·kōl) out of all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים 5971 Art│N-mp ( hā·‘am·mîm) peoples אֲשֶׁ֖ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) - עַל־ 5921 Prep ( ‘al-) on פְּנֵ֥י 6440 N-cpc ( pə·nê) the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ס 127 Art│N-fs ( hā·’ă·ḏā·māh) of the earth.

לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō did not מֵֽרֻבְּכֶ֞ם <WH7231> mê·rub·bə·ḵem because you were more numerous מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik·kāl than the other הָֽעַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> hā·‘am·mîm peoples, חָשַׁ֧ק <WH2836> ḥā·šaq set His affection יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD בָּכֶ֖ם Prep│2mp ( bā·ḵem) on you וַיִּבְחַ֣ר 977 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yiḇ·ḥar) [and] choose בָּכֶ֑ם Prep│2mp ( bā·ḵem) you כִּֽי־ 3588 Conj ( kî-) for אַתֶּ֥ם 859 Pro-2mp ( ’at·tem) you הַמְעַ֖ט 4592 Art│Adj-ms ( ham·‘aṭ) were the fewest מִכָּל־ 3605 Prep-m│N-msc ( mik·kāl) of all הָעַמִּֽים׃ 5971 Art│N-mp ( hā·‘am·mîm) peoples.

כִּי֩ <WH3588> kî But מֵֽאַהֲבַ֨ת <WH160> mê·’a·hă·ḇaṯ loved יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah·weh because the LORD אֶתְכֶ֗ם <WH853> ’eṯ·ḵem you וּמִשָּׁמְר֤וּ <WH8104> ū·miš·šå̄·mə·rū and kept אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַשְּׁבֻעָה֙ <WH7621> haš·šə·ḇu·‘āh the oath אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - נִשְׁבַּע֙ <WH7650> niš·ba‘ He swore לַאֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1> la·’ă·ḇō·ṯê·ḵem to your fathers, הוֹצִ֧יא <WH3318> hō·w·ṣî brought you out יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah·weh He אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> ’eṯ·ḵem - בְּיָ֣ד <WH3027> bə·yāḏ hand חֲזָקָ֑ה <WH2389> ḥă·zā·qāh with a mighty וַֽיִּפְדְּךָ֙ <WH6299> way·yip̄·də·ḵā and redeemed you מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> mib·bêṯ from the house עֲבָדִ֔ים <WH5650> ‘ă·ḇā·ḏîm of slavery, מִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> mî·yaḏ from the hand פַּרְעֹ֥ה <WH6547> par·‘ōh of Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> me·leḵ- king מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> miṣ·rā·yim of Egypt.

וְיָ֣דַעְתָּ֔ <WH3045> wə·yā·ḏa‘·tā Know therefore כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- that יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God ה֣וּא <WH1931> hū ... הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> hā·’ĕ·lō·hîm is God, הָאֵל֙ <WH410> hā·’êl God הַֽנֶּאֱמָ֔ן <WH539> han·ne·’ĕ·mān the faithful שֹׁמֵ֧ר <WH8104> šō·mêr who keeps הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> hab·bə·rîṯ His covenant וְהַחֶ֗סֶד <WH2617> wə·ha·ḥe·seḏ of loving devotion לְאֹהֲבָ֛יו <WH157> lə·’ō·hă·ḇāw of those who love Him וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> ū·lə·šō·mə·rê and keep מִצְוֹתוֹ <WH4687> miṣ·wō·ṯō His commandments. לְאֶ֥לֶף <WH505> lə·’e·lep̄ for a thousand דּֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> dō·wr generations

וּמְשַׁלֵּ֧ם <WH7999> ū·mə·šal·lêm He repays לְשֹׂנְאָ֛יו <WH8130> lə·śō·nə·’āw But those who hate Him אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> pā·nāw their faces לְהַאֲבִיד֑וֹ <WH6> lə·ha·’ă·ḇî·ḏōw with destruction; לֹ֤א <WH3808> lō He will not יְאַחֵר֙ <WH309> yə·’a·ḥêr hesitate לְשֹׂ֣נְא֔וֹ <WH8130> lə·śō·nə·’ōw the one who hates Him. אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> pā·nāw his face יְשַׁלֶּם־ <WH7999> yə·šal·lem- to repay לֽוֹ׃ Prep│3ms ( lōw)

וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֨ <WH8104> wə·šā·mar·tā So keep אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַמִּצְוָ֜ה <WH4687> ham·miṣ·wāh the commandments וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- and הַֽחֻקִּ֣ים <WH2706> ha·ḥuq·qîm statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- and הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <WH4941> ham·miš·pā·ṭîm ordinances אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that אָנֹכִ֧י <WH595> ’ā·nō·ḵî I מְצַוְּךָ֛ <WH6680> mə·ṣaw·wə·ḵā am giving you הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> hay·yō·wm this day. לַעֲשׂוֹתָֽם׃פ <WH6213> la·‘ă·śō·w·ṯām to follow

( The Promises of God) ( 20 23:20-33 ) וְהָיָ֣ה׀ <WH1961> wə·hā·yāh - עֵ֣קֶב <WH6118> ‘ê·qeḇ If תִּשְׁמְע֗וּן <WH8085> tiš·mə·‘ūn you listen to אֵ֤ת <WH853> ’êṯ - הַמִּשְׁפָּטִים֙ <WH4941> ham·miš·pā·ṭîm ordinances הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> hā·’êl·leh these וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֥ם <WH8104> ū·šə·mar·tem and keep them carefully וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> wa·‘ă·śî·ṯem אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> ’ō·ṯām , וְשָׁמַר֩ <WH8104> wə·šā·mar will keep יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yah·weh then the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God לְךָ֗ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) אֶֽת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - הַבְּרִית֙ 1285 Art│N-fs ( hab·bə·rîṯ) His covenant וְאֶת־ 853 Conj-w│DirObjM ( wə·’eṯ-) and הַחֶ֔סֶד 2617 Art│N-ms ( ha·ḥe·seḏ) the loving devotion אֲשֶׁ֥ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) that נִשְׁבַּ֖ע 7650 V-Nifal-Perf-3ms ( niš·ba‘) He swore לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ 1 Prep-l│N-mpc│2ms ( la·’ă·ḇō·ṯe·ḵā) to your fathers.
